snippet: Bill Cosby has been sued by a Pennsylvania woman who says she was defamed when he and his representatives cast aspersions on the accuracy of the accounts of women, like her, who have come forward to say he sexually abused them.
abstract: Bill Cosby has been sued by a Pennsylvania woman who says she was defamed when he and his representatives cast aspersions on the accuracy of the accounts of women, like her, who have come forward to say he sexually abused them.

headline.print_headline: A New Lawsuit Filed Against Cosby
headline.main: Cosby Accuser Files Suit in Pennsylvania
